biotools.summary: A program that finds potential disease-causing variants from whole-exome or whole-genome sequencing data. Starting from a VCF file and a set of phenotypes encoded using the Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) it will annotate, filter and prioritise likely causative variants depending on the user-defined criteria.

bioschemas.name: Exomiser
